Row.Text: Tässä on strategiani kylmästä sodasta: me voitamme, he häviävät. - Ronald Reagan
Jos jokin kaupungin keskusta tuhotaan ydinaseella, tuhoa eniten kaupungin keskuksia vuororajan puitteissa.
Ainoa tapa voittaa on olla pelaamatta.
Jos yhtään kaupungin keskustaa ei tuhota ydinaseella, omista eniten panssarivaunuja vuororajan saapuessa.
Sinulla on eniten panssarivaunuja pelin lopussa! Voitat!

The Cold War runs hot in this combat-based scenario set in the Atomic Era. Lasts 50 Turns.[NEWLINE]Victory Conditions[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Lord of the Armageddon: If any city center is nuked, nuke the most city centers by the turn limit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Tank Banker: If no city centers are nuked, have the most tanks by the turn limit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Proxy War: Capture 3 city-states.[NEWLINE]Gameplay Changes[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Units and nuclear devices are cheaper to build and maintain. They don't require strategic resources.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Extended ranges for WMD Strikes and Bombers.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Builders have more charges for faster city development.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The map starts revealed.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No Tribal Villages.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No Barbarians.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]War Weariness is disabled.
Kylmä sota kuumenee tässä taistelupainotteisessa skenaariossa, joka sijoittuu atomiaikaan. Kestää 50 vuoroa.

The Cold War runs hot in this combat-based scenario set in the Atomic Era. Lasts 50 Turns.[NEWLINE]Victory Conditions[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Lord of the Armageddon: If any city center is nuked, nuke the most city centers by the turn limit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Tank Banker: If no city centers are nuked, have the most tanks by the turn limit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Proxy War: Capture 3 city-states.[NEWLINE]Gameplay Changes[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Units and nuclear devices are cheaper to build and maintain. They don't require strategic resources.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Extended ranges for WMD Strikes and Bombers.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Builders have more charges for faster city development.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]The map starts revealed.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No Tribal Villages.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]No Barbarians.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]War Weariness is disabled.
